skills.name: SKEWER
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Lower Accuracy of enemies for 1 turn.
• Increase Accuracy of allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: STORM
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to all enemies.
• 45% Chance to inflict Shock for 3 turns.
• Shock deals magic damage for 2 turns with a chance to Lower Power each turn.

skills.name: SIEGE
desc: Reduces the duration of beneficial effects every turn. (Does not apply to first turn beneficial effects)
